game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game Class, contains Game Elements, such as Zone, and Players

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Player current
      Current Player, contains a reference to the current Player
      protected Player[] player
      Array of Players, contains the Players.
      protected Zone zone
      Zone, contains the Fields and the Pawns.

    • Constructor Summary

      Game()
      Constructor of Game Class.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear method, used to clear the whole zone by putting all pawns to empty. Will be used when the game will be playable again, to avoid destroying and reconstructing all objects. call clear() of Zone Class
        See Also:
        Zone

      • getPawn

        public Pawn getPawn(int _x,
           int _y)
        Method to get the Pawn at the specified location
        Parameters:
        _x - X position of the Pawn
        _y - Y Position of the Pawn
        Returns:
        A Pawn
        See Also:
        Pawn

      • setCurrent

        private void setCurrent(Player _current)
        Method to set the current player. Used mainly by the nextPlayer method.
        Parameters:
        _current - A Reference to the player that should be the current player.
